And one month's trade figures don't mean that SA no longer has a balance of payments (BoP) problem. One of the worst things you can do is branch out on your own and attempt to change how Forex operates. Finding an edge could take months even years but once we have acquired such an edge, it is not the end and expecting windfall profits could only be a dream which is as good as wishful thinking. If you are new to Forex trading systems, be careful to seek a registered broker and avoid off-exchange currency dealers and the scam forex brokers.
